DOC.brief_summary: The aim is to evoke romantic jealousy between couples and investigate whether oxytocin has effect on it.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Oxytocin on Romantic Jealousy
DOC.detailed_description: In a double-blind, between- subject placebo (PLC) controlled design,investigators plan to test the effect of intranasal oxytocin on romantic jealousy evoked by the Imaginary of Partner's Infidelity Task and Cyberball Game in romantically attached subjects.
DOC.criteria: healthy couples in romantic relationship for more than 3 months and have intimate experience with each other before. medical or psychiatric illness
